short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gets you in a spooky mood for the spookiest time of year.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Spooky Season is an extension that changes references to fall or autumn to "Spooky Season", as well as some other key phrases changed to their spooky counter parts.
